name.ja: <ruby>冥<rt>めい</rt></ruby><ruby>跡<rt>せき</rt></ruby>の<ruby>記<rt>き</rt></ruby><ruby>録<rt>ろく</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: When an opponent's monster declares an attack while you have an EARTH Attribute Beast-Warrior Type monster in your Graveyard.

effect.en: Negate the attack. Then, you can Special Summon 1 EARTH Attribute Beast-Warrior Type monster from your Graveyard to your field in face-up Defense Position.
